strapiPost.title: Nightmare on Block Street Returns
strapiPost.content:
Nightmare on Block Street is returning this year with events during the whole month of October! Primarily an immersive themed pop-up bar at Pinpoint in Fayetteville, there will be multiple events the public can enjoy around town.

  • Dress up: The Nightmare on Block Street pop-up bar will feature a new Halloween-themed menu and “a complete Halloween sensory overload.” The pinball machines at Pinpoint will be made scary, and it’s sure to be a good time. 
  • Get scary: Other events are Conjuring & Other Sins at 100 W Center, dubbed as “Fayetteville’s only truly haunted alleyway,” Bram Stoker’s Dracula presented by Ballet Arkansas, Horror Movie Screenings at Mt. Sequoyah, and a Vampire Blood drive at Pinpoint. 

Read the KNWA story HERE.
